      Configures the environment. This is a one time operation, so any calls to this method after the value is initially set not do anything

      Deprecated.

      Deprecated. 
      The environment to initialize hardware in

      Deprecated. 
       
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.snakeskin.hardware.IHardware> getRepository()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a read-only copy of the hardware repository. This is a view of the hardware repository, meaning it stays up to date with the hardware repository, but cannot be modified.
      boolean hasHardware(java.lang.String key)
      Deprecated. 
      Checks if the hardware repository has the given hardware.

      Deprecated.

      • configureEnvironment

        public void configureEnvironment(Environment newEnv)
        Deprecated. 

        Configures the environment. This is a one time operation, so any calls to this method after the value is initially set not do anything

      • getHardware

        public IHardware getHardware(java.lang.String key)
        Deprecated. 

        Gets a hardware object from the hardware repository with the given type and id specified in 'key'

        Throws:
        - If the hardware with the given key could not be found

      • addHardware

        public void addHardware(java.lang.String key,
                        IHardware hardware)
        Deprecated. 

        Adds a hardware object to the hardware repository

      • getRepository

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.snakeskin.hardware.IHardware> getRepository()
        Deprecated. 

        Returns a read-only copy of the hardware repository. This is a view of the hardware repository, meaning it stays up to date with the hardware repository, but cannot be modified.
